name: Hello Elise
description:
This visual novel is about a young boy named Parker who is unhappy to move into a new town. He is severely homesick on the first week and nothing can convince him to feel comfortable in his new home. He misses everyone he left behind because now he knows no one.  He steps outside of his home and meets a strange girl named Elise in an abandoned building and forms an unlikely friendship with her. Parker is confused why Elise is so attached to this building.  

The inspiration for this idea was the story of the screaming tunnel in Canada.

  • The assets were done using Adobe Photoshop and Sketch Up. 
  • The royalty free music was selected from freesound.org and pixabay.com. 
  • And the game was produced in Unity using fungus.

  The video attached to this website contains the full  walk-through video

 so please watch at your own risk if you want to avoid spoilers!
